name: Bonesaw
descriptions: Bonesaw is the third of four unique marked men encountered in the Divide in 2281 in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Lonesome Road.

Bonesaw is a ravager located slightly southeast of the Ashton silo control station around a small building. His health and combat skills are higher than those of a normal marked man and are on par with those of a companion. Fitting his name, he carries around a chainsaw for melee combat. Bonesaw moves 30% faster than a normal non-player character and has the Ruthless perk, which grants him a 25-point bonus to melee damage.
He has the most Hit Points out of all the unique marked men.
Bonesaw appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Lonesome Road.

Frumentarii: Alerio · Cato Hostilius · Gabban · Karl · Picus · Disguised frumentarius · Ulysses (formerly)
Consul: M. Licinius Crassus · M. Scribonius Libo Drusus (of the consul)
